outputs.output_descr: Enabling environment created as well as capacity developed to undertake DRM activities at all levels; Disaster Management plans consisting of response and preparedness activities at state, district and village levels; disaster management teams created by training local volunteers to undertake main response functions and mock drills conducted to rehearse the roles and responsibilities.

Disaster Reduction Multi-hazard preparedness planned at community level through development of preparedness and mitigation plans with specific focus on gender sensitive approaches (Gujarat and Orissa).
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS INTER-AGENCY SECRETARIAT FOR THE INTERNATIONAL STRATEGY FOR DISASTER REDUCTION.
